content.rendered:
Portfolio Management

Real-Time Portfolio
Management

Invest smarter with the portfolio that always keeps you in the know.

Get Your Portfolio
Under Control

Before Altshare

You've got a handful of companies to manage in your portfolio. But when it comes to analyzing their data, you’re left with an ununiform, incomplete database -- because every company has it’s own standard of reporting. What you need is one way that works.

After Altshare

With Altshare, you get real-time updates and insights on your entire portfolio in one, simple platform. No more chasing down the numbers you need. Now they’re right there waiting to drive your future investment decisions. That's portfolio management, done smart.

request a demo

Your Portfolio. Organized.

Real-time Updates.
Anytime.

Harness the power of live data to see updates on your entire portfolio the second they happen. Then easily model the data, to get the most relevant insights.

Real-time Updates.
Anytime.

Harness the power of live data to see updates on your entire portfolio the second they happen. Then easily model the data, to get the most relevant insights.

Your Entire Portfolio.
Under One Roof.

With all ownership and financial data in one place, you easily visualize KPIs, track performance and make every decision data-driven.

Your Entire Portfolio. Under One Roof.

With all ownership and financial data in one place, you easily visualize KPIs, track performance and make every decision data-driven.

Show Investors
the Money

Keep your investors up-to-date on the performance of your fund, from indicators like net asset value, to financial reports and ownership data. Then easily generate and distribute periodic reports on your entire portfolio.

Show Investors
the Money

Keep your investors up-to-date on the performance of your fund, from indicators like net asset value, to financial reports and ownership data. Then easily generate and distribute periodic reports on your entire portfolio.

Compare Assets
to Assets

Get big picture insights you can trust when you streamline the way you collect and measure data. Now you confidently compare across companies, knowing every variable is measured the same.

Compare Assets
to Assets

Get big picture insights you can trust when you streamline the way you collect and measure data. Now you confidently compare across companies, knowing every variable is measured the same.

Founders Taking Ownership of 409A

Inbal Myers
Director of Finance, Rapyd

“Instead of complex and expensive manual term sheet analysis, AltShare’s solution does it all automatically - cap table management, waterfall analysis, modeling…and more!”
Leeron Aran
VP Finance, Guesty

“AltShare’s 409A Valuation Solution is a game-changer for us. The fact that we can produce work paper-ready, defensible 409A valuations in less than an hour – and without hiring a consultant – is changing the way we handle our valuations.”
Roei Khermosh
CFO, Papaya Global

“AltShare helps me access my portfolio with a user friendly interface. I would suggest this product to any company that want's to offer stocks to their employees.”
Stephanie Pardo
CFO , Shift Technology

“Easy to navigate the equity management and platform which include a dashboard view and menu with features like updated cap table, ESOP Management, 409A valuations and more.”
Jonathan Eldan
VP Finance, LawGeex

“I like how this software generate all required reports, analyses and is user friendly. Very easy to run waterfall scenarios based on the company's cap table and also very easy to understand the graphs that are generated.”
Eli Kalman
VP Finance, WSC Sports Technologies

“Analytical tools are great. The software is also very flexible and allows for individual customization of many items.”
Tal Brener
CFO, Natural Intelligence

“AltShare is extremely friendly and flexible and helps me manage the employee’s equity in an easy efficient way, it saves overheads, improves accuracy and serve the variety of the corporate needs.”
Eyal Toledano
Co-Founder & CTO, Zebra Medical

“Altshare is a must have for any company looking to streamline the complex equity management process. Not only does it save us a ton of time, but it also provides our employees & shareholders a level of transparency that is unmatched.”
request a demo

Discover what is preventing you from holding an updated cap table. Hint: It’s the stock options segment.

Main actions you can take to better handle your equity when your company struggles

Helping you understand who should be asking for your cap table and what will they ask
